statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT device_id, ip_address, mac_address FROM network_traffic_data WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT device_id, ip_address, threat_level FROM network_traffic_data WHERE mac_address = '00:11:22:33:44:55';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM network_traffic_data WHERE threat_level IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE threat_level > 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT ip_address FROM network_traffic_data WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY ip_address
SELECT device_id, mac_address, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND threat_level IS NOT NULL ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM network_traffic_data WHERE mac_address LIKE 'F8:32:%'
SELECT device_id, threat_level FROM network_traffic_data WHERE threat_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY device_id
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT source_ip, packet_size FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM NetworkTrafficData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE packet_size > 1500 AND protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-02';
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE protocol = 'TCP'
SELECT device_id, timestamp, source_ip, packet_size FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE packet_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, source_ip, destination_ip, packet_size FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE protocol = 'UDP' AND packet_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY device_id
SELECT device_id, timestamp, destination_ip, packet_size FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND source_ip LIKE '192.168.%' ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(packet_size), MAX(packet_size), MIN(packet_size) FROM NetworkTrafficData GROUP BY protocol
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, mac_address, last_seen FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY last_seen ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Server' AND ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Switch' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, last_seen FROM NetworkDevices WHERE last_seen > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_seen ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT device_name, traffic_type, data_amount FROM NetworkDevices JOIN NetworkTraffic ON NetworkDevices.device_id = NetworkTraffic.device_id WHERE data_amount > 1000 AND traffic_type = 'Incoming' ORDER BY data_amount DESC;

SELECT device_name, threat_level, description FROM NetworkDevices JOIN SecurityAlerts ON NetworkDevices.device_id = SecurityAlerts.device_id WHERE threat_level = 'High' ORDER BY device_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, event_type, event_description FROM security_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level FROM threat_data WHERE threat_level >= 3;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM mitigation_strategies;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, source_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic WHERE data_size > 1000 AND source_ip = '192.168.1.10' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, data_size FROM network_traffic WHERE device_id = 5 AND data_size > 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM threat_data WHERE threat_level >= 7 ORDER BY threat_level DESC, threat_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE connection_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, mac_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficLogs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT threat_type, threat_level, detected_at FROM SecurityThreats WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE connection_status = TRUE;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, action FROM TrafficLogs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreats WHERE threat_level = 'High' AND detected_at >= '2022-01-01' LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address, connection_status FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY ip_address ASC, device_id DESC;
